item.title: A Critical Approach to Building Digital Collections
item.description: HUMN Bodies and Minds Group Project For this assignment you’ll be using CollectionBuilder, an open-source tool for creating digital collection and exhibit websites that are driven by metadata and powered by modern static web technology, and Github, a free repository service, to create your own digital collections of archival material. Our archival material will be sourced from the Ringling Archives (special thanks to the Ringling Archives staff for supporting this assignment).

item.title: Critical Digital Literacy and Web Archives
item.description: Lesson Plan Learning Outcomes Students will read a text on web archives and demonstrate good comprehension of the text and technology explained therein Students will be able to explain how contemporary historical research can be conducted using web archives Students will be able to identify potential problems, challenges, and opportunities of web archive use in historical research Students will learn how to find web archive collections and use them for historical research
